Class MusicPlayer

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
model.MusicPlayer
public class MusicPlayer extends javafx.application.Application
MusicPlayer class to handle the playback of random background music in the application. It ensures that only one instance of the player exists using the Singleton pattern.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Grant Von Hagen, Mahip Varlani
